item.title: Use Snap to install the Hugo edge version on Fedora and Ubuntu
item.description: If you are using the Fedora or Ubuntu Linux distributions – I’m currently on Fedora 28 – and would like to help test the latest development version of Hugo, or if you just want to be on the bleeding-edge of things, this post is for you. Fedora-only steps To get started, install Snap on Fedora: sudo dnf install snapd Add the Snap directory to your PATH by adding this line to your ~/.
